name: Hambone Goes on a Rampage
description:
A game made in 7 days for the Boundless-game-jam. 

Hambone is a complete meathead with only one thing on his mind - rampaging! He is so focused on violence he forgot how to even walk or pause the game.

Use Left Mouse Button to complete an action from an alternating set of moves. They can be either movement-based or attack moves.
